thread.title: KeepCalling.com Announces New and More Affordable Monthly Plans for Pakistan, Colombia, China, and Romania
thread.title_full: KeepCalling.com Announces New and More Affordable Monthly Plans for Pakistan, Colombia, China, and Romania - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: KeepCalling.com Announces New and More Affordable Monthly Plans for Pakistan, Colombia, China, and Romania
text:
KeepCalling.com announces incredibly low rates for calls to Romania and China calling plans and brand new calling options for Pakistan and Colombia.
Atlanta, Georgia (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
KeepCalling.com has great news for everyone making calls to Pakistan, Colombia, Romania, or China on a regular basis. KeepCalling.com now offers new and more affordable monthly plans for these destinations to suit every need. All these novelties are already available on KeepCalling.com.
KeepCalling.com welcomes Pakistan and Colombia as new Monthly Plan destinations, joining the already existing 14 (Australia, Bangladesh, Bulgaria, China, Germany, India, Kenya, Mexico, New Zealand, Nigeria, Poland, Romania, South Korea, Thailand, and US). Monthly Plans are the best solution for customers who make a high number of calls to a certain country because:
customers pay a low monthly fee for a high number of minutes the rate per minute is more convenient than Voice Credit rates the payment is processed automatically every month, without the customer’s intervention the plans can be canceled any time with no penalties
Pakistan 500 and Pakistan 1000 allow customers to make cheaper calls to Pakistan. Both plans offer minutes to all numbers in this country and help customers save money by paying only 1.9¢/min. Pakistan 500 costs $9.49/month, while Pakistan 1000 can be used for $18.99/month.
For Colombia, KeepCalling.com introduces 3 types of monthly plans : Colombia 200 ($4.99/month), Colombia 500 ($10.99/month), and Colombia 1000 ($18.99/month). All 3 plans are destined for calls to both landlines and mobiles in Colombia and offer very convenient rates per minute: with Colombia 200, the rate is 2.5¢/min, with Colombia 500 it’s 2.2¢/min, while with Colombia 1000 customers get the best deal: only 1.9¢/min.
The monthly plans for Romania come with good news too. The prices for Romania 500 and Romania 1000 have decreased significantly. Romania 500, offering 500 minutes to landlines and mobiles in Romania used to cost $7.49/month, but customers now pay only $4.99/month, therefore 1¢/min. After its cost was $14.99/month, Romania 1000 is now only $9.99/month.
China plans are now also cheaper. China 550 went from $4.99/month to $3.88/month (0.7¢/min), while China 1100 now costs $6.88/month (0.6¢/min) after an initial $8.98/month. With both plans, customers can call any number in China.
The minutes offered by monthly plans can be used:
1. from any phone, through the use of local access numbers
2. from any smartphone, as KeepCalling.com offers a free app, for both iOS and Android devices
3. from any computer, through the Web Call application.
About KeepCalling.com
KeepCalling.com is an interactive website designed by KeepCalling, a global telecommunications company registered in 2002 in USA. Presently, KeepCalling provides its services to hundreds of thousands of consumers and businesses, with a focus on customer satisfaction. KeepCalling has been listed by Inc 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in the USA for 5 consecutive years. In 2015 the company registered a revenue increase of over 200% from 2011 to 2014.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb12990719.htm
